turns.speaker: Caroline
turns.text: Hey Mel! Good to see you! How have you been?

turns.speaker: Melanie
turns.text: Hey Caroline! Good to see you! I'm swamped with the kids & work. What's up with you? Anything new?

turns.speaker: Caroline
turns.text: I went to a LGBTQ support group yesterday and it was so powerful.

turns.speaker: Melanie
turns.text: Wow, that's cool, Caroline! What happened that was so awesome? Did you hear any inspiring stories?

turns.imageCaption: a photo of a dog walking past a wall with a painting of a woman
turns.speaker: Caroline
turns.text:
The transgender stories were so inspiring! I was so happy and thankful for all the support.
[Image: a photo of a dog walking past a wall with a painting of a woman]

turns.speaker: Melanie
turns.text: Wow, love that painting! So cool you found such a helpful group. What's it done for you?

turns.speaker: Caroline
turns.text: The support group has made me feel accepted and given me courage to embrace myself.

turns.speaker: Melanie
turns.text: That's really cool. You've got guts. What now?

turns.speaker: Caroline
turns.text: Gonna continue my edu and check out career options, which is pretty exciting!

turns.speaker: Melanie
turns.text: Wow, Caroline! What kinda jobs are you thinkin' of? Anything that stands out?

turns.speaker: Caroline
turns.text: I'm keen on counseling or working in mental health - I'd love to support those with similar issues.

turns.imageCaption: a photo of a painting of a sunset over a lake
turns.speaker: Melanie
turns.text:
You'd be a great counselor! Your empathy and understanding will really help the people you work with. By the way, take a look at this.
[Image: a photo of a painting of a sunset over a lake]

turns.speaker: Caroline
turns.text: Thanks, Melanie! That's really sweet. Is this your own painting?

turns.speaker: Melanie
turns.text: Yeah, I painted that lake sunrise last year! It's special to me.

turns.speaker: Caroline
turns.text: Wow, Melanie! The colors really blend nicely. Painting looks like a great outlet for expressing yourself.

turns.speaker: Melanie
turns.text: Thanks, Caroline! Painting's a fun way to express my feelings and get creative. It's a great way to relax after a long day.

turns.speaker: Caroline
turns.text: Totally agree, Mel. Relaxing and expressing ourselves is key. Well, I'm off to go do some research.

turns.speaker: Melanie
turns.text: Yep, Caroline. Taking care of ourselves is vital. I'm off to go swimming with the kids. Talk to you soon!

turns.speaker: Melanie
turns.text: Hey Caroline, since we last chatted, I've had a lot of things happening to me. I ran a charity race for mental health last Saturday – it was really rewarding. Really made me think about taking care of our minds.

turns.speaker: Caroline
turns.text: That charity race sounds great, Mel! Making a difference & raising awareness for mental health is super rewarding - I'm really proud of you for taking part!

turns.speaker: Melanie
turns.text: Thanks, Caroline! The event was really thought-provoking. I'm starting to realize that self-care is really important. It's a journey for me, but when I look after myself, I'm able to better look after my family.

turns.speaker: Caroline
turns.text: I totally agree, Melanie. Taking care of ourselves is so important - even if it's not always easy. Great that you're prioritizing self-care.

turns.speaker: Melanie
turns.text: Yeah, it's tough. So I'm carving out some me-time each day - running, reading, or playing my violin - which refreshes me and helps me stay present for my fam!

turns.speaker: Caroline
turns.text: That's great, Mel! Taking time for yourself is so important. You're doing an awesome job looking after yourself and your family!

turns.speaker: Melanie
turns.text: Thanks, Caroline. It's still a work in progress, but I'm doing my best. My kids are so excited about summer break! We're thinking about going camping next month. Any fun plans for the summer?

turns.speaker: Caroline
turns.text: Researching adoption agencies — it's been a dream to have a family and give a loving home to kids who need it.

turns.speaker: Melanie
turns.text: Wow, Caroline! That's awesome! Taking in kids in need - you're so kind. Your future family is gonna be so lucky to have you!

turns.imageCaption: a photography of a sign for a new arrival and an information and domestic building
turns.speaker: Caroline
turns.text:
Thanks, Mel! My goal is to give kids a loving home. I'm truly grateful for all the support I've got from friends and mentors. Now the hard work starts to turn my dream into a reality. And here's one of the adoption agencies I'm looking into. It's a lot to take in, but I'm feeling hopeful and optimistic.
[Image: a photography of a sign for a new arrival and an information and domestic building]

turns.speaker: Melanie
turns.text: Wow, that agency looks great! What made you pick it?

turns.speaker: Caroline
turns.text: I chose them 'cause they help LGBTQ+ folks with adoption. Their inclusivity and support really spoke to me.

turns.speaker: Melanie
turns.text: That's great, Caroline! Loving the inclusivity and support. Anything you're excited for in the adoption process?

turns.speaker: Caroline
turns.text: I'm thrilled to make a family for kids who need one. It'll be tough as a single parent, but I'm up for the challenge!

turns.speaker: Melanie
turns.text: You're doing something amazing! Creating a family for those kids is so lovely. You'll be an awesome mom! Good luck!

turns.speaker: Caroline
turns.text: Thanks, Melanie! Your kind words really mean a lot. I'll do my best to make sure these kids have a safe and loving home.

turns.speaker: Melanie
turns.text: No doubts, Caroline. You have such a caring heart - they'll get all the love and stability they need! Excited for this new chapter!
